my doctor told me i have six months to live.

I need to balance my work and family life.
I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all!
I can't wait to wear my new sweater when I go horseback riding.
I dress for my audience.

content.text: Hello! I'm going back to school to study medicine, like my father.
That's interesting! What made you decide to go into medicine?
My father is a great doctor, and I've always been interested in the medical field. I'm also interested in helping people, and I think a career in medicine would allow me to do that.
That's a great reason to go into medicine. I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love spending time with my dog, she's my best friend! I also like to go horseback riding, and I'm learning how to finish drywall like my dad.
That's awesome! I love dogs too. I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all! I also like to go horseback riding, but I'm not very good at it.
Haha, I'm sure your dog was happy to share his chocolate bar! I'm not very good at horseback riding either, but I'm having a lot of fun learning.
Me too! It's a great way to get some exercise and have some fun.
It is! I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
